section.title: MySQL
section.para: Monitors the status of MySQL dabase servers.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: The agent has been tested with MySQL version 4.0 and 5.0.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following configuration options are available:

itemizedlist.listitem: Username: Login name to use when connecting to the MySQL server
Password: Password to access the MySQL server
Port number: The port number on which to connect to the MySQL server.
JDBC driver jar name: The path to the jar file that contains the MySQL JDC driver; the path is relative to IxoraRMS installation folder.
Database: The name of the database to monitor
JDBC driver class name: The name of the class implementing the MySQL JDBC driver

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The agent returns all the status data available from the database server.
